hero.title: Djenepo Couture
hero.subtitle: Premium Custom Tailoring
hero.description: Experience the art of bespoke tailoring with over 7 years of expertise. We create extraordinary clothing that reflects your unique style and personality.

featured.subtitle: Discover our most popular custom-tailored pieces, crafted with precision and attention to detail

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our exquisite range of traditional and contemporary African fashion, each piece crafted with exceptional artistry and cultural authenticity

vestes.title: Premium Vestes
vestes.description: Sophisticated African-inspired jackets that command respect and admiration. Perfect for business leaders, cultural ceremonies, and distinguished occasions where elegance meets tradition.

abacosts.title: Authentic Abacosts
abacosts.description: Traditional African formal wear that embodies dignity and cultural heritage. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to authentic details and modern comfort for the discerning gentleman.

tunique.title: Elegant Tuniques
tunique.description: Graceful tunics that celebrate the modern African woman's style. Designed for versatility and comfort, perfect for both professional settings and social gatherings.

broderie.title: Artisanal Broderie
broderie.description: Masterfully embroidered tunics featuring intricate African motifs and patterns. Each piece tells a unique cultural story through exquisite needlework and artistic expression.

chemises.title: Designer Chemises
chemises.description: Refined shirts that blend contemporary fashion with subtle African influences. Crafted for the modern professional who values both style and cultural connection.

about.title: About Djenepo Couture
about.subtitle: Where craftsmanship meets elegance, and every stitch tells a story of dedication and passion.

hero.title: About Djenepo Couture
hero.subtitle: Where craftsmanship meets elegance, and every stitch tells a story of dedication and passion.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2018, Djenepo Couture began as a small family business with a simple vision: to create exceptional clothing that combines traditional craftsmanship with contemporary style. What started as a passion project has grown into one of the city's most trusted names in bespoke tailoring.
story.paragraph2: Our master tailors bring years of experience to every piece they create. Using time-honored techniques passed down through generations, combined with modern innovations, we ensure that each garment not only fits perfectly but also reflects your unique personality and style.
story.paragraph3: At Djenepo Couture, we believe that clothing is more than fabric and thread ‚Äì it's an expression of who you are. That's why we take the time to understand your needs, preferences, and lifestyle to create garments that you'll treasure for years to come.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We never compromise on quality. Every stitch, every detail is executed with precision and care.

service.title: Personal Service
service.description: Each client receives individual attention and personalized service throughout their journey with us.

craft.title: Timeless Craft
craft.description: We honor traditional tailoring methods while embracing modern techniques and innovations.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Our love for the craft drives us to create exceptional pieces that exceed expectations.

bespoke.title: Bespoke Suits
bespoke.description: Custom-made suits tailored specifically to your measurements and preferences. From business attire to wedding suits, each piece is crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

formal.title: Formal Wear
formal.description: Elegant evening gowns, cocktail dresses, and formal wear for special occasions. We create stunning pieces that make you feel confident and beautiful.

alterations.title: Alterations & Repairs
alterations.description: Professional alterations and repairs to ensure your existing garments fit perfectly and maintain their quality and appearance.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: Personal styling consultations to help you choose the perfect fabrics, cuts, and designs that complement your body type and lifestyle.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to create your perfect custom garment? Get in touch with us today to schedule a consultation or ask any questions you may have.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Get instant responses to your questions

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Book your consultation today and begin your journey to exceptional custom clothing.

footer.description: Premium custom tailoring services with over 7 years of experience. We create exceptional clothing that fits your style perfectly.
